page.title: 01Around and About Bylchau
page.content: Bylchau is an upland area of {farmland.}Most of the land is rough grazing,with some moorland,and some suitable for growing crops such as hay,barley and potatoes.Most of the farms are mixed with both sheep and cattle. The hamlet of Bylchau itself consists of a church,shop,community centre and a few houses. It is an area of{outstanding {natural beauty}and provides an environment for a large variety of wild life. It is{not a highly populated area,and it consists of scattered farms and country cottages.Most of the people who live here{speak Welsh}and they are deeply rooted to their close knit community.
